name: Chai Shaddai
seeking: Seeks JV partners who serve an audience hungry for personal finance education and wealth-building content — particularly readers who engage with financial literacy materials and prosperity mindset resources. Would benefit from partnerships with financial educators, wealth coaches, or self-help publishers whose audiences overlap with readers interested in written content on money and success. Co-promotions with personal finance blogs, podcast hosts, or wealth-building communities would help distribute Chai Shaddai's written work.
who_you_serve: Personal finance enthusiasts, wealth-building seekers, and readers interested in financial education and prosperity mindset.
what_you_do: Creates written content focused on personal finance education and wealth building.
offering: Writer. Helps clients achieve their business and personal goals.
social_proof: PhD, MBA, LLB (Hons 1), BA-Psych, Dip Pos. Psych, IECL Certified Coach; over 7 million learners; educational videos viewed over 300 million times.
bio: PhD, MBA, LLB (Hons 1), BA-Psych, Dip Pos. Psych, IECL Certified Coach; over 7 million learners; educational videos viewed over 300 million times.
business_focus: Creates written content focused on personal finance education and wealth building. (leadership development)
